data.title: Typical McD
data.text: Standard McD. Easy in and out, typical McD menu. Used for quick late night snacks. Located 1/2 block form SF convention center.

data.title: Really bad, even against the low bar that is McDonalds
data.text:
An awful experience. It was chaos in the ordering area, even though really not that busy. Computer-screen menus were confusing, and order taker couldn't figure out how to enter customer requests even when the ordered items were found on the confusing menus ad the manager had to repeatedly come out and take over the register.

I ordered two cookies with my meal, could see my order on the orders screen, and watched while an employee took them form the case, put them in the small bags for the purpose, and set that on the tray waiting for my other items. Then I watched another confused employee put my waiting cookies into another, drive-through order even though not required for that one. When the rest of my order was ready, the manager apologized that they were our of cookies and made weak excuses when I pointed out that mine had been accidentally given to another order.

This place needs a management upgrade to even stand a chance of recovering.

data.title: @ McDonald's. Airport Blvd South San Francisco
data.text: Standard McDonald's. It is situated between a number of hotels in the area which help when staying overnight at one of these hotels.

data.title: fast and cheap
data.text: Not too many people when I ate here. Fast service no waiting in line. Going inside to order is faster than drive through.

data.title: worst McD's franchise ever
data.text: I work near this restaurant and they always get my order wrong, have an issue with something on the menu, or outright get my order wrong. The drive thru line is always super slow.

data.title: Fast service and clean
data.text: Food are served fast and the place is clean.  Very accessible from our hotel.  Excellent service and staffs are very polite and jolly.

data.title: Normal McDee's food
data.text: I good place to pick up a quick breakfast without it breaking your pocket book. The food we got there was pretty good.

data.title: An OK joint
data.text: This place is busy in the mornings. Service was adequate and food was typical for the chain. Good for a quick local meal.

data.title: Really bad!
data.text: I honestly didn't think it was possible to screw up an order for a Big Breakfast and a small coffee, but this McDonald's did so.  It was honestly just a bad experience in a very small, rundown McDonald's.  Wish I could say something positive about this meal, but I can't imagine what it could be.

data.title: It's McDonalds
data.text: The food is never very good, but it is clean and fast and the iced tea is acceptable because they give you choices for it.

data.title: YOU SUCK
data.text: went thru your drive thru didn't 1 of the 2 sandwiches I ordered...and you want $15 bucks an hour. I hope they replace your dumb as* with a order machine that can get it right.  IDIOTS..

data.title: Great meal
data.text: Very impressed with the cleanliness and attentiveness of the staff! Ali was super friendly and should be training others in the franchise how to take care of customers.  Everyone was moving or cleaning, which to me is the sign of a well organized team effort.  Good job Jose for managing a well oiled machine.

data.title: Foster City McDonalds needs better customer service
data.text: Although the customer service has improved somewhat, there is still lots of room for improvement.  Hard to get a thank you, much less a good morning or welcome.  Also lacks details to service.  It is not uncommon to have a straw missing, a loose lid on the soda, or getting a crispy when you asked for a grilled.  I know, I know...it is a fast food joint.  But I never have trouble with the locations in San Mateo.  In fact, I will go out of my way to other locations rather be subjected to a disappointing visit.

data.title: Quick and easy
data.text: McDonalds will always be quick and easy if you are in a rush and want bad food. I might suggest staying in your car and using the drive through.

data.title: Its a McDonald's - comforting in its conformity
data.text: I gave this an "average" vote, but it was average in a good way.  Its a McDonald's, not a 5 star restaurant.  Used drive-thru and it was quick and well lit.  Line was pretty long, and there were menus posted along the way so you could decide before you got up to the speaker.  Food was as expected.  Totally convenient to my hotel across the street, so I'd go there again in a heartbeat.

data.title: TOO SLOW!
data.text: This was the Mcdonalds right across from the Best Western Grosvener. We went around 1pm on Monday and there was ONE person taking orders and ONE person filling them. There were about 20 people standing there waiting for food when we walked in and about 3 people waiting in line to order. If I wasn't so tired and didn't feel like driving I would have left. It took us 20 minutes of waiting just to get our order of two meals. Insane! My wrap wasn't even hot....how is that possible???

data.title: Bom e barato
data.text: Mac é mac... sempre bom e barato!!! Bom para economizar, mas com as lanchonetes de lá, nao é uma boa opção para comer.

data.title: Lo mejor
data.text: McDonald's simplemente no falla. En el lugar donde estes siempre esta ahi disponible esperandote. Me encanta.

data.title: a salvação de sempre
data.text: O Mc Donald's você sabe que é bom e rápido o gosto é o mesmo no mundo inteiro, o refrigerante é sempre refil!

data.title: uno mas como tantos
data.text: es para comer algo antes de ir al hotel, los baños no estaban muy limpios y el personal un tanto lento, pero bueno, habia habre y lo encontramos de pasada
